Item.Title: Googled "small apartment ideas" for decorating my new, very small, apartment. I suppose I should try "my shed of an apartment" instead.
Item.Description:
Seriously though! WHO would consider this a small apartment?! Im talkin hope I find enough room for my packages of ramen noodle small here!
And this wasnt the only one! Go ahead, type in "small apartment ideas" and youll be like...welp...my place sucks. lol
